summary: Totally retextured dragonscale armor in hig resolution
descriptionHtml:
Titanium Dragonscale Armor Retexture Set
By ColdFire

This is my personal textures set for dragonscale armor.
I had worked all my life with metals and crystals came to my mind the crystals of pure titanium and their high refractive index and pleochroism which give the pure mineral (like the Rutile and Spinel) shimmer that even after being forged especially to the flame. Flip effect that the mineral loses once bound with steel.
So I thought of as a mythical beast as the dragon could metabolize the mineral in their tissues.

The textures are all made in high resolution, 2024 the two main male and female, and 1024 all the others. Adding also the new high resolution cubemap.
author: ColdFire
